ItemTooltips.sobi_mask: Early mana regen, after you will do a urn.
ItemTooltips.ward_observer: Sometimes you need to support your team too.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Nice team Item, and give you a lot of survivability.
ItemTooltips.urn_of_shadows: You can use offensive too, this with your aura and pulse will easily kill a support.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: Gives you a disable other than the ult. A really nice item in the late game against the enemy carry.
ItemTooltips.cyclone: An ok disable, that guarantee a little survivability
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter:
Nice overall stasts.
And you can kill with your ult more easily.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: you cant heal if you are stunned.
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard:
Nice to chase, nice to tank, nice mana pool and nice damage.
Really good item against some heroes.
ItemTooltips.bloodstone: You wont die item, with enough charges you can spam pulse.

AbilityTooltips.necrolyte_death_pulse:
Nice skill overall, to farm, to kill, to survive, to spam.
If you suffer a gank, spam this skill and you have  a higher chance of survive.
AbilityTooltips.necrolyte_heartstopper_aura: I like just a point in the early levels to harass your opponents without pushing much your lane.
AbilityTooltips.necrolyte_sadist: If you have a good skills last hitting, this passive is awesome. Kill a hero and you are almost full mana/life to keep killing.
AbilityTooltips.necrolyte_reapers_scythe: This ultimate is really nice, you can stun a immune target or kill a high life pool opponent.
